Ebbro 44518 Nissan Skyline Turbo Group 5 Launch

After years of absence in production car racing Nissan intended to fully dominate the new Group 5 series and returned with a set of Fairladies (or Datsun 280ZX in North America) in 1979 and lost. Although I wasn't able to find any photos (yet) they probably looked something like this one driven by Paul Newman:


In 1980 and 1981 private teams used a Nissan Violet 710 and a Silvia S110 and Nissan supplied them with parts like the LZ20B engine. The S110 only had two wins during those early years. I've had no luck finding a racing Violet 710 from this era but here is a what the Silvia S110 looked like:


In 1982 they teamed up with Nissan and had a line up of the Skyline KDR30, Silvia S12, and the Bluebird 910. Here is some great footage of all 3 in action in the same race: https://youtu.be/lg7QpcPXELk?t=3m7s

Ebbro's model seen below is the Nissan Skyline Turbo Group 5 launch car. Again, I have not been able to find any photos of the real thing, only a 1:24 Gunze Sangyo kit that looks exactly like this. A nice model model from Ebbro but it looks like the front tire is trying to eat the wheel.
